6 Always wear utility gloves while handling sharps. 
/circle6 Dispose of the needle with a hub cutter which cuts the plastic hub of the syringe and not 
the metal part of the needle. 
/circle6 Dispose of needles and syringes in a puncture-proof container. 
/circle6 Do not disassemble the needle and syringe aft  er use. Make needles unusable aft er single 
use by burning them in a needle destroyer.
/circle6 Do not recap, bend or break needles before disposal.
/circle6 Never burn syringes.
/circle
